DataSourcePortable.Name: MÃ©dia Visita Semanal
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT COUNT(*) MEDIAVISSEMANAL
FROM K_CRM_TAREFAUSUARIO A
INNER JOIN K_CRM_PESSOAS B ON A.PESSOA = B.HANDLE
WHERE DATEPART(WEEK,A.DATACONCLUSAO) = DATEPART(WEEK,GETDATE())
AND B.FASE NOT IN (1,6)
AND A.RESPOSTA NOT IN (75)
AND B.USUARIOEXECUTIVO = @USUARIO
" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="MEDIAVISSEMANAL" From="A" Path="MEDIAVISSEMANAL" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
